titles.title: To provide for an annual statement of accrued liability of the Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Budget.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 10/30/1997--Introduced. Amends Federal budget law to require the President, in the annual budget submission to the Congress, to include a statement of the current accrued liabilities of the Federal Government for future benefits under the Old-Age and Survivors Insurance Program under title II of the Social Security Act.
